Q: What is the content of 1th section? The content should be an excerpt as it appears in the LaTeX file, including the heading line and any sub-section.
label: LaTeX
simple
PathWalk
rule_hint: Note that section titile is enclosed by \\section{}, and \\subsection for subsection, \\subsubsection for subsubsection. To find the content of certain section, look for ith section as specified, and start from there look for jth subsection. And from located subsection, look for kth subsubsection as queried. Search may stop early if subsection or subsubsection is not queried.
